skins.shipDescription: I am the Iris's shining sword, Le Malin. As the shimmering idol who chases the waves, may your souls be healed by my songs of prayer.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Le Fantasque-class destroyer, Le Malin, reporting for duty. Heheh... Just watch, I'll do an amazing job on this idol mission. J-just to be clear, it's not like I was looking forward to this!
skins.acquisition: I am the Iris's shining sword, Le Malin. As the shimmering idol who chases the waves, may your souls be healed by my songs of prayer.
skins.login: Good morning. What will today's lesson be?
skins.details: I didn't really want to do this, but I'll see this idol mission through. I will bring the elegance of the Iris to the world stage.
skins.secretaryIdle1: An "idol" is something that people worship and exalt. As the word suggests, we mustn't do anything that would shorten that distance.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Jean Bart told me to just enjoy myself, but... the expectant gazes of Le Triomphant and Richelieu... it burns!
skins.secretaryIdle3: That little girl from the Royal Navy.. . Not only does she act all innocent, she also sings about "prayer." Hehe, as if I'd let her steal my thunder~
skins.secretaryTouch: Thanks for always cheering me on~
